name: Violet Vestige
description:
Survive for 2 minutes. That's... kinda it for now.

This is a demo / prototype.

CONTROLS:

AWSD: Move

Left Mouse: Shoot

Spacebar: Dash.

ESC: Pause / Unpause

BACKSPACE: Crash Game

Notes:

Pressing Q, E, R, or F will slow the character down. By a lot. Why? Because I forgot to remove it.

You actually have 2 HP. But I... also forgot to include the HUD.

FEEDBACK CONTEXT (v1.0.1):

- How do the controls feel?

- Is the crosshair too big?

- How's the difficulty?

- Is it fun at the moment?

Please do write out "(the version you tried)" at the beginning of your feedback/ comment. It helps me keep things in order~

Thanks a lot for your time!
